subject: Football (College)
Sports Injuries
Knees
lead_paragraph: Marcus Lattimore, a junior running back for No. 9 South Carolina, is an example of how hard it is for a star running back to overcome mental struggles after a serious injury.
snippet: Marcus Lattimore, a junior running back for No. 9 South Carolina, is an example of how hard it is for a star running back to overcome mental struggles after a serious injury.
